name: Poblano Breakfast Potatoes
description: Despite being hands off these Poblano Breakfast Potatoes have incredible flavor.  Chop 'em up, throw 'em in the oven, and 30-40 minutes later breakfast is served.  So good!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425F.  Give the potatoes and poblano a good rinse.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425F.  Give the potatoes and poblano a good rinse.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice up the potatoes into bite sized chunks, somewhere between 1/4" and 1/2" wide.  Dice up the poblano and 1/2 onion into slightly smaller sized chunks (be sure to discard the poblano seeds.)
recipeInstructions.name: Dice up the potatoes into bite sized chunks, somewhere between 1/4" and 1/2" wide.  Dice up the poblano and 1/2 onion into slightly smaller sized chunks (be sure to discard the poblano seeds.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl combine the potatoes, poblano, 1/2 onion, 4 whole peeled garlic cloves, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and freshly cracked black pepper.  You can optionally add 1/2 teaspoon of hot chili powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a mixing bowl combine the potatoes, poblano, 1/2 onion, 4 whole peeled garlic cloves, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and freshly cracked black pepper.  You can optionally add 1/2 teaspoon of hot chili powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the mixture into an even layer on a baking sheet.  (I line the baking sheet with parchment paper for easier cleanup but cooking them directly on the pan will crisp them up more.)
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the mixture into an even layer on a baking sheet.  (I line the baking sheet with parchment paper for easier cleanup but cooking them directly on the pan will crisp them up more.)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425F for 30-40 minutes, stirring them at least once while they are baking.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425F for 30-40 minutes, stirring them at least once while they are baking.

recipeInstructions.text: Take a final taste for seasoning.  I added another generous pinch of salt to this batch.  Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Take a final taste for seasoning.  I added another generous pinch of salt to this batch.  Serve immediately.
